scripts.dist:
yarn workspaces foreach -p run build && rm -Rf ./dist && cp -R ./packages/aiacta-hub/dist ./dist && cp -R ./packages/aiacta-frontend/dist ./dist/frontend && cp ./packages/aiacta-prisma/prisma/schema.prisma ./dist/schema.prisma && cp -R ./packages/aiacta-graphql/graphql ./dist/graphql && cp ./packages/aiacta-hub/server.crt ./dist/server.crt && cp ./packages/aiacta-hub/server.key ./dist/server.key && echo "PORT=4000

GRAPHQL_SCHEMA=./graphql/**/*.gql

SSL_CERTIFICATE=./server.crt" > ./dist/.env
